title: Since the February Security update my phone will not charge w/out changing the UBS connect preferenc
content:
When I plug my phone in (even using the original cord and brick) the phone will not charge.   I noted a "P" in the alerts area and pulled the menu down (Note: i have not seen this since the first time)  the alert read "Android System: Charging connected device via USB"; when i tapped it for more info, another line appeared, "Tap for more options"; 
It then brings me to the USB Preferences and i need to change "USB controlled by:" and the select "this device"

For the record, i have worked with chat and called in.  Chat recommended that I bring my phone in or send it in and pay for repair or upgrade.

Chat advised the only next step was to Factory Reset, something I would have prefer to avoid at all cost.
